properties.name: app.jwt-secret
properties.description: Secret key for signing JWT tokens

properties.name: app.jwt-expiration-milliseconds
properties.description: Expiration time for JWT tokens in milliseconds.

properties.name: stripe.api.key.secret
properties.description: Secret API key for Stripe API can be used in server side

properties.name: stripe.api.key.publish
properties.description: Publishable API key for Stripe API can be used in client side
